DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate SmartLipo Triplex laser system along SideLaze800 hand piece treatment Acne Scars .
DOC.brief_title: The Smartlipo Triplex 1440nm Wavelength Laser Sidelaze 800 Hand Piece Treatment Facial Acne Scars
DOC.criteria: A healthy male female 18 65 year old Has unwanted facial acne scar wish undergo laser treatment . Is willing consent participate study . Is willing comply requirement study include photograph , follow post treatment care attend follow visit . The subject female pregnant , pregnant within last 3 month , currently breast feed plan pregnancy study period . The subject hypersensitive light exposure OR take photo sensitized medication . The subject active localize systemic infection . The subject coagulation disorder currently use anticoagulation medication ( include limit heavy use aspirin ) { great 81 mg per day } ) . The subject currently enrol investigational drug device trial , receive investigational drug treat investigational device within plan treatment area 3 month prior enter study . The subject use Accutane within 6 month prior enrollment . The subject need expose artificial tanning device excessive sunlight trial . The subject prior treatment parenteral gold therapy ( gold sodium thiomalate ) . The subject history keloid . The subject evidence compromise wound healing . The subject history squamous cell carcinoma melanoma . The subject history immunosuppression/immune deficiency disorder ( include HIV infection AIDS ) use immunosuppressive medication . The subject allergy lidocaine epinephrine . The subject condition , investigator 's opinion , would make unsafe subject participate research study .
